channel.title: Comments on: Do you use your own product?

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2017-8-21-do-you-use-your-own-product/#comment-12">Mick Moignard</a>.
<p>We're English Mick, of course we go to the beach in the rain :-)</p>
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mick Moignard.

We’re English Mick, of course we go to the beach in the rain ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Mick Moignard
item.dc:creator: Mick Moignard
item.description: <p>You want to get to a beach, in the rain! And you want to impose that on your kids as well!<br/>Actually what's worse is to try and do one of these signups by text once the voice recognition bit fails. That's really tortuous</p>
item.content:encoded:
You want to get to a beach, in the rain! And you want to impose that on your kids as well!
Actually what’s worse is to try and do one of these signups by text once the voice recognition bit fails. That’s really tortuous
